name: SearchTransferOrders
description:
Search for transfer orders using specific filters.

This tool searches for transfer orders using various filters, returning a paginated list of matching orders sorted by creation date. It can find orders by source or destination location or by a specific transfer order status.

parameters.name: source_location_ids
parameters.description: Array of source location IDs to filter transfer orders by their source location.

parameters.name: destination_location_ids
parameters.description: Array of destination location IDs to filter transfer orders.

parameters.name: filter_by_order_statuses
parameters.description: Filter transfer orders by their statuses. Accepts an array of status strings. Refer to TransferOrderStatus for valid values.

value_schema.description:
Filter by order statuses
See [TransferOrderStatus](#type-transferorderstatus) for possible values

parameters.name: sort_by_field
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort transfer orders. Options: CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT.

value_schema.description:
Fields that can be used for sorting [TransferOrder](entity:TransferOrder)s in search results.
Used with [SearchTransferOrders](api-endpoint:TransferOrders-SearchTransferOrders) to control
the order of returned results.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify the order ('DESC' or 'ASC') in which results are returned. 'DESC' for descending and 'ASC' for ascending.

value_schema.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string token to continue a search from a previous position, enabling pagination through results.

value_schema.description: Pagination cursor from a previous search response

parameters.name: maximum_results
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to return, from 1 to 100.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: query.filter.statuses
parameters.description:
Filter by order statuses
See [TransferOrderStatus](#type-transferorderstatus) for possible values

value_schema.description:

See [TransferOrderStatus](#type-transferorderstatus) for possible values

parameters.description:
Fields that can be used for sorting [TransferOrder](entity:TransferOrder)s in search results.

value_schema.description:

Used with [SearchTransferOrders](api-endpoint:TransferOrders-SearchTransferOrders) to control
the order of returned results.

parameters.name: query.sort.order
parameters.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

value_schema.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor from a previous search response

value_schema.description: Pagination cursor from a previous search response

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

value_schema.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)
